body.p: The origin story of Kirk Simpson who is the co-founder and CEO of Wave, hated everything to do with accounting, invoicing and payroll. It was annoying to deal with when running a business. He owned two successful tech companies.It was at a time when there wasnâ€™t a simple and free financial software in the market for small businesses.

He understood that there needed to be new changes. Kirk Simpson knew there had to be a better way to support small business owners. So in 2010, Kirk Simpson and James Lochrie worked on a project for many months figuring out what businesses needed. They both worked hard figuring out the problems and what solutions can be done to help small bussiness. A lot of research was done before anyything came out of it.

They officially launched Wave. It started out with only eight employees working out of a small office in Toronto. Wave has since grown to become an award-winning financial services software company, with more than 250 employees serving entrepreneurs and freelancers around the world.
